# Harp of Charming
## Overview
**Aura** faint enchantment; **CL** 5th

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 7,500 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

This beautiful and intricately carved harp can be held comfortably in one hand, but both hands are required to utilize its magic. When played, a *harp of charming* enables the performer to work one *[[Suggestion (Spell)|suggestion]]* (as the spell, Will DC 14 negates) into the music for each 10 minutes of playing if he can succeed on a DC 14 [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]] (string instruments) check. If the check fails, the audience cannot be affected by any further performances from the harpist for 24 hours.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Suggestion (Spell)|suggestion]]*

**Cost** 3,750 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 516
